title: EC Campus Document Submission Doubt
content:
I got my 12th puc markscard a few days back
Now i have to submit it right?(Submitted a printout of result with principal signature)
I submitted all my other original documents like 10th marks card transfer certificate and stuff in rr campus and they said something like we will send the documents to ec campus after a week all together or something

If i have to submit the 12th marks card do i go to rr campus or ec campus

comments.body:
go to rr campus  
they told me that they'll send it to ec after 2 months
did you give your 12th marks card also seperately?
Yes I gave it just a few days back
